title: @Meddler: Nasus stat binding?
body: So what are the possible upcoming changes to Nasus? I would love to see a bit more of an opening in his builds. Items with CDR are automatically glued to his building. I love Nasus, I am dying to hear what you guys are up to with him!

replies.body: No immediate plans. When we do need to make changes to Nasus, whether balance (buff or nerf), other game health or just general improvements though we'll look at whether some of that should be done via stat binding.

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uTY54cGW,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-26T21:52:58.396+0000)
>
> No immediate plans. When we do need to make changes to Nasus, whether balance (buff or nerf), other game health or just general improvements though we'll look at whether some of that should be done via stat binding.

i think you should look at his lvl stats and stat gains per level, as they are far the worst from all juggernauts. combine that with the fact that he is super immobile, has almost no source of sustaining in a team fight (like, for example, darius do), has the worst early in the entire game and you have a big problem here

If Juggernauts are supposed to build HP, his ult should probably grant him rather damage reduction than bonus max HP.

Or it should scale off his bonus HP.

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uTY54cGW,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-27T00:10:33.452+0000)
>
> If Juggernauts are supposed to build HP, his ult should probably grant him rather damage reduction than bonus max HP.
> 
> Or it should scale off his bonus HP.

If they decide that Nasus *should* be bound to HP. Stat binding is a tool, and it's OK not to use it in every case.

nasus just needs a rework. as much as i love the one shot Q farming for 30 minutes. its becoming far too lame and one dimensional. he has nothing else going for him. his E is lame. his W is annoying af to deal with.. hes just really bad to have on your team or really unhealthy to play against

The thing is Nasus doesn't need to farm for 30 minutes to be relevant. He is ready to hit back at about 15 minutes. I am so tired of people crying about how he's unfair to play against. Not every champion needs to go balls to the walls and start dueling 3 minutes into a game. Nasus is a champion who controls the pace of a lane which is a rare trait for a champ in the ever present true damage era, overloaded kits, and three hit passives.  Nasus excels fairly with his core fantasy. A slow building giant hyper threat. Like any champion he can be shut down and made ineffective. My point is not every champion needs to shape up like what is meta or flavor of the month. There is nothing wrong with a bit of simplicity.
He should get reworked to be more fun to play against.
